wikipedia_page.main:
Mike Voyle (born  (1970-01-03) 3 January 1970, Caerphilly, Wales), is a former Wales international rugby union player. A lock forward, he played club rugby for Newbridge RFC, Ebbw Vale RFC, Llanelli RFC, Newport RFC, Cardiff RFC and Newport Gwent Dragons.
Voyle attained 22 caps for Wales and he was selected for the Wales squad for the 1999 Rugby World Cup.

response: Mike Voyle, a resident of Ystrad Mynach, is the only Penallta player to have represented Wales. He won 21 caps as a tight forward between 1997 and 2001.
